mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply1(rno, bno, reply, replyer) values(seq_reply1.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply1 set reply=#{reply}, updateDate=sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from tbl_reply1 where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
